--- Page 1 (pdf_text) ---
Centre for Military Airworthiness and Certification
FORM - 44
DEFECT INVESTIGATION REPORT FORMAT
In accordance with IMTAR – 21, Subpart C1, 21.C1.18, Subpart C2, 21.C2.9 & Subpart C3, 21.C3.1.20.
Part - I (Reference): Incident /Accident/ Snag / Explosive
a) Defect Report (DR) No: DR/2024/0340 b) Date of Occurrence: 14/06/2024
c) Installation Details: Nighthawk Stealth - AC-4617-523 at
Base Alpha
Part - II: (Details of Defective Component)
a) Trade: Electrical b) Date Component 19/06/2024
Received:
c) System/Sub System: Power Distribution d) Main Assembly: Wing Root Port
e) Nomenclature: Power Distribution Assembly Unit f) MOD Status: MOD-D
g) Part No.: EL-5235-E5 h) Sl No.: SN-9277-529
i) Firmware Version: FW-6.64.807 j) Software Version: Not Applicable
k) Date of Installation: 20/01/2023 l) Date of Removal: 16/06/2024
Pg No: 24 Ln No: 9 Pg No: 22 Ln No: 21
m) Manufacturing Agency: Advanced Flight Technologies n) Date, Month & Year March 2018
of Manufacturing:
o) Whether under warranty: No p) Whether under AMC Yes
/ Repair Contract:
q) Life completed since New: 1125 Hrs / 214 Cycles

--- Page 2 (pdf_text) ---
Centre for Military Airworthiness and Certification
FORM - 44
DEFECT INVESTIGATION REPORT FORMAT
Part - III: (Defect Details)
a) Defect Category: Safety Critical
b) Defect Observed: Inverter output voltage deviation. Issue identified during pre-flight checks.
Part IV: Investigation: (Details of Examination including previous similar Defects)
a) Root Cause Analysis: Contamination ingress through damaged seal assembly
b) Findings / Conclusions: Detailed investigation conducted on the defective Power Distribution component.
Inspection revealed damage to critical components.
c) Remedial Measures Revise maintenance procedure to include additional verification steps
i. Corrective Action:
ii. Preventive Action: Modify design to incorporate additional safety margin
d) Attributable Code: N1 - Defect confirmed but reason not established
Remarks: Investigation completed as per established procedures. All findings documented.
Part V: Remarks by Design
Design review completed. No design modification required. Component replacement as per maintenance manual is adequate.
Date: 10/07/2024 Authorized Signatory of Design: Gp Capt N.R. Kumar

--- Page 3 (pdf_text) ---
Centre for Military Airworthiness and Certification
FORM - 44
DEFECT INVESTIGATION REPORT FORMAT
Part VI: Remarks by Quality Dept.
Manufacturing quality documentation reviewed. No deviations noted. Concur with investigation findings.
Date: 11/07/2024 Signature: Wg Cdr D.S. Nair
Part VII: Remarks by User(Project):(if applicable)
User feedback incorporated. Recommend enhanced crew training on system operation and limitations.
Date: 11/07/2024 Signature: Eng. T.R. Menon
Part VIII: Remarks by ORDAQA (Quality Aspects)
From quality standpoint, root cause analysis is thorough. Corrective measures are appropriate. Concur.
Date: 13/07/2024 Signature: Eng. R.P. Singh
Part IX: Remarks by CEMILAC / RCMA (Design Aspects)
Certification review completed. Proposed modifications do not affect type design approval. Acceptable.
Date: 15/07/2024 Signature: Wg Cdr B.P. Gupta
Edition Number: 1.0 Form Version Number: 1.0 Date: January 2021
